replies.body:
Get better internet. Honestly, I've got lag too. Pretty bad lag (maybe as bad as yours), but it is all because of our internet service or our computers. Riot will tell you when something bad is happening with lol on the lol status website:

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/
>I haven't actually played for about a week.
Mine's stopped working altogether, I can't reconnect to my game.
